messageBody:
hi friends
iam a student from sweden. i need help on following points.

1.How do i install and run with Jcreator?

2. I tried to set classpath at cmd prompt and tried to run some
samples but geting errors.(i followed junit faq
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#started_2)


H:\JCreator\JUNIT_HOME>set CLASSPATH=%JUNIT_HOME%\junit.jar

H:\JCreator\JUNIT_HOME>java junit.textui.TestRunner
junit.samples.Alltests
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
junit/textui/TestRunn
er


thanks in advance
krishna.
